title: Hong Kong Spends Rs 76 Lakh on Panda Renaming, Then Keeps Original Names
content: The taxpayer's money was spent to build a website for the activity, recruit staff, post advertisements and offer prizes to winners.
summary: The taxpayer's money was spent to build a website for the activity, recruit staff, post advertisements and offer prizes to winners.

title: Undercover FBI Agents Had No Role In US Capitol Attack: Report
content: Undercover FBI agents were not present during the 2021 attack on the US Capitol by Donald Trump supporters, a Justice Department watchdog said Thursday in a report debunking a popular right-wing conspiracy theory.
summary: Undercover FBI agents were not present during the 2021 attack on the US Capitol by Donald Trump supporters, a Justice Department watchdog said Thursday in a report debunking a popular right-wing conspiracy theory.

title: NASA's Rover To Unveil Mysteries Of Red Planet After Challenging Climb
content: NASA's Perseverance Rover first landed in the Jezero Crater in February 2021.
summary: NASA's Perseverance Rover first landed in the Jezero Crater in February 2021.

title: Syrian Rebels Vow To Search For Missing US Journalist Austin Tice
content: Syria's new leadership said Thursday it was searching for missing US journalist Austin Tice and had secured the release of another American it said had been held by the ousted government.
summary: Syria's new leadership said Thursday it was searching for missing US journalist Austin Tice and had secured the release of another American it said had been held by the ousted government.

title: Two Airplane-Sized Asteroids Flying Past Earth At Alarming Speed Today
content: Space enthusiasts are in for a major cosmic event on Friday as NASA said that two aeroplane-sized asteroids -- 2024 XW15 and 2024 XC16 -- are all set to fly past Earth.
summary: Space enthusiasts are in for a major cosmic event on Friday as NASA said that two aeroplane-sized asteroids -- 2024 XW15 and 2024 XC16 -- are all set to fly past Earth.

title: Amazon Donates $1 Million To Donald Trump's Inaugural Fund
content: Amazon is donating $1 million to US President-elect Donald Trump's inaugural fund and the company will air the event on its Prime Video service, an Amazon spokesperson said on Thursday.
summary: Amazon is donating $1 million to US President-elect Donald Trump's inaugural fund and the company will air the event on its Prime Video service, an Amazon spokesperson said on Thursday.

title: US Couple, On A Holiday In Mexico, Shot Dead
content: A US couple was shot dead in the violence-plagued western Mexican state of Michoacan, state prosecutors said on Thursday, just after the country's president had wrapped up a meeting with security officials aimed at addressing a wave of violence.
summary: A US couple was shot dead in the violence-plagued western Mexican state of Michoacan, state prosecutors said on Thursday, just after the country's president had wrapped up a meeting with security officials aimed at addressing a wave of violence.

title: Significant Improvement For Indians In Green Card Queue For January 2025
content: The US Department of State's Bureau of Consular Affairs recently released its Visa Bulletin for January 2025, giving updates to the green card applicants.
summary: The US Department of State's Bureau of Consular Affairs recently released its Visa Bulletin for January 2025, giving updates to the green card applicants.

title: Baba Vanga's 2025 Predictions: 'War In The East Will Destroy The West'
content: Baba Vanga's 2025 predictions include a catastrophic war between the East and West, alien contact leading to a potential crisis, advancements in telepathy and nanotechnology, and significant scientific breakthroughs.
summary: Baba Vanga's 2025 predictions include a catastrophic war between the East and West, alien contact leading to a potential crisis, advancements in telepathy and nanotechnology, and significant scientific breakthroughs.

title: Travis Timmerman, Missing US Citizen Found In Syria After Release From Prison
content: The United States is working to get an American citizen found on Thursday in Syria out of the country and bring him home, US Secretary of State Antony Blinken said in Jordan, where he held meetings to discuss the political transition of Syria.
summary: The United States is working to get an American citizen found on Thursday in Syria out of the country and bring him home, US Secretary of State Antony Blinken said in Jordan, where he held meetings to discuss the political transition of Syria.

title: 3 Indians Shine On Forbes' 2024 World's Most Powerful Women List
content: Forbes has unveiled its 21st annual list of The World's 100 Most Powerful Women, a ranking of influential figures from industries such as business, entertainment, politics, philanthropy and policymaking.
summary: Forbes has unveiled its 21st annual list of The World's 100 Most Powerful Women, a ranking of influential figures from industries such as business, entertainment, politics, philanthropy and policymaking.

title: "6 Years Of Harassment": Elon Musk vs US Markets Regulator Showdown
content: Billionaire Elon Musk has slammed the US market regulator, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) over probes into Neuralink - a neurotechnology firm owned by the world's richest man - and the purchase of Twitter shares.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk has slammed the US market regulator, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) over probes into Neuralink - a neurotechnology firm owned by the world's richest man - and the purchase of Twitter shares.

title: 'Living Nostradamus' Predicts Imminent WW3 Amid 'Global System Collapse'
content: Athos Salome, the self-proclaimed "Living Nostradamus," predicts an imminent World War III, fueled by a "global system collapse."
summary: Athos Salome, the self-proclaimed "Living Nostradamus," predicts an imminent World War III, fueled by a "global system collapse."

title: Delay Hits IndiGo Flights Connecting Istanbul, Hundreds Of Fliers Stranded
content: Hundreds of IndiGo passengers flying to or from Turkey are stranded for 24 hours due to what the airline has said an operational delay. These include passengers on at least four flights connecting Istanbul with Delhi and Mumbai.
summary: Hundreds of IndiGo passengers flying to or from Turkey are stranded for 24 hours due to what the airline has said an operational delay. These include passengers on at least four flights connecting Istanbul with Delhi and Mumbai.

title: Luigi Mangione, Who Killed US CEO, Was Not A Client Of His Company
content: Luigi Mangione, who was arrested for allegedly killing UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, was never a client of the medical insurance company, a New York Police Department (NYPD) official said.
summary: Luigi Mangione, who was arrested for allegedly killing UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, was never a client of the medical insurance company, a New York Police Department (NYPD) official said.

title: Joe Biden Launches Plan To Combat Islamophobia Days Ahead Of Trump Takeover
content: US President Joe Biden on Thursday released a long-awaited strategy for countering anti-Muslim and anti-Arab hate, up sharply since the start of the Israel-Gaza war, calling for urgent, continued work to reduce discrimination and bias.
summary: US President Joe Biden on Thursday released a long-awaited strategy for countering anti-Muslim and anti-Arab hate, up sharply since the start of the Israel-Gaza war, calling for urgent, continued work to reduce discrimination and bias.

title: Ex-Pak PM Imran Khan, Wife Bushra Bibi Indicted In New Corruption Case
content: Former Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan and his wife, Bushra Bibi were indicted in a new corruption case on Thursday.
summary: Former Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan and his wife, Bushra Bibi were indicted in a new corruption case on Thursday.

title: Blinken Asks Turkey's Erdogan For Protection Of Syria Civilians
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan on Thursday that Syrian civilians need to be protected after Ankara-backed Islamists overthrew the Damascus government.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan on Thursday that Syrian civilians need to be protected after Ankara-backed Islamists overthrew the Damascus government.

title: Biden Watching Situation In Bangladesh Very Closely: White House
content: President Joe Biden is closely monitoring the situation in Bangladesh and the US will hold the Bangladeshi interim government accountable for ensuring the protection of religious and ethnic minorities in the country, the White House has said.
summary: President Joe Biden is closely monitoring the situation in Bangladesh and the US will hold the Bangladeshi interim government accountable for ensuring the protection of religious and ethnic minorities in the country, the White House has said.

title: India's FDI Hits $1 Trillion Since Turn Of Century. Biggest Investor Is...
content: This week India crossed a major milestone as a top global investment destination. Latest data reveals that Foreign Direct Investment into India crossed a thousand-billion-dollar mark since the turn of the century.
summary: This week India crossed a major milestone as a top global investment destination. Latest data reveals that Foreign Direct Investment into India crossed a thousand-billion-dollar mark since the turn of the century.
